description: A soap opera was having a casting call in Miami for a ?Latin lover? and Eric got their ad mixed up with ours. That would usually be the end of the story but as you can tell from the pictures, that was just the beginning of one of our most unexpected episodes.With a little persuading and a few Coronas, we told Eric this would be a good way to practice his English and to lose his stage fright.  He lost that all right - along with his clothes and inhibitions. The camera loved every inch of him. He has a face that is truly leading man handsome and a body that was meant to be photographed.When he turns around, he presented us with the finest, whitest, tighest roundest pair of globes that should never ever be covered! Strong and silent, he works that uncut cock hard then tweaks his own nips, sending out a big creamy load that covered that magnificent body from thighs to abs.
title: Eric The Movie, Scene #02
